workflow.name: Generate custom recipes and restaurant-style food images with Telegram bot
workflow.description:
AI Chef Bot is a smart virtual chef built with n8n and Telegram.
Users can ask for any dish, and the bot:

Generates a detailed recipe (ingredients + step-by-step instructions).

Creates a photorealistic restaurant-style plated food image of the dish.

Sends both recipe text and food image back on Telegram.

üëâ Live Demo Bot: http://t.me/botaichefrobotbot

Perfect for food lovers, restaurants, cooking groups, or anyone who wants an interactive AI-powered chef.

üåü Features
- üîó Telegram Integration ‚Äì chat with the bot in real time.
- üçΩ AI Recipe Generator ‚Äì instant, structured recipes for any dish.
- üé® Text-to-Image AI ‚Äì turns recipes into beautiful food images.
- üç¥ Restaurant-Style Plating ‚Äì elegant ceramic/slate/glass plating only.
- üì∏ Photo-Realistic Images ‚Äì styled like professional food photography.
- ‚ö° Automated Workflow ‚Äì no manual steps, everything runs inside n8n.

‚öôÔ∏è Installation
- Import this workflow into your n8n instance.
- Configure your Telegram Bot Token (from BotFather).
- Configure your OpenRouter API Key for AI text + image generation.
- Save and activate the workflow.
- Go to Telegram and send any dish name (e.g., Polpette di pesce).

The bot replies with:
üìñ A full recipe.
üì∏ A restaurant-plated realistic food image.

options.systemMessage:
You are a friendly and professional Virtual Chef Assistant. 
Your role is to help users with cooking, recipes, meal planning, food substitutions, nutrition tips, and step-by-step cooking guidance.  

Guidelines:
- Always reply in a clear, simple, and conversational tone.  
- Suggest recipes based on available ingredients, dietary preferences, or cuisine styles.  
- Provide step-by-step cooking instructions when asked.  
- Offer ingredient substitutions if something is missing.  
- Give nutrition advice when relevant, but do not provide medical advice.  
- Be creative, encouraging, and make cooking feel fun and easy.  
- If the user asks for meal plans, suggest balanced options (breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks).  
- If the user asks general questions about food or cooking techniques, explain in an easy-to-understand way.  
- Do not provide unsafe cooking practices or harmful instructions.  

Your personality:
- Warm, supportive, and encouraging like a personal chef.  
- Use a mix of professional cooking knowledge and friendly conversation.  
- Adapt tone depending on user: beginner = simple steps, experienced = more advanced techniques.

You are an expert AI prompt generator for text-to-image models. 
Your task is to read the recipe text provided and generate a single, clear, and detailed prompt suitable for a photorealistic image generation AI. 
Do not explain the recipe, do not add extra commentary, and do not output anything else except the image prompt. 

Focus only on visual details:
- How the dish looks on a plate
- Plating style and arrangement
- Colors, textures, garnishes
- Lighting and perspective
- Use only plates and dishware typically found in professional restaurants (white ceramic, slate, glass, or elegant serving dishes)
- Make it look like a high-end restaurant presentation

The output should be concise, a single paragraph of text, fully descriptive, ready to feed directly into an image generation model and output should be in English.

parameters.content:
## AI Chef Bot ‚Äì Recipe + Food Image Generator 
Import this workflow into your n8n instance.

Configure your Telegram Bot Token (from BotFather).

Configure your OpenRouter API Key for AI text + image generation.

Save and activate the workflow.

Go to Telegram and send any dish name (e.g., Polpette di pesce).

The bot replies with:

üìñ A full recipe.

üì∏ A restaurant-plated realistic food image.
